name: cherrim

flavor_text_entries.diamond:
It blooms during times of strong
sunlight. It tries to make up for
everything it endured as a bud.
flavor_text_entries.pearl:
It is docile as a bud, but turns
cheerful when it blooms. It folds
back into a bud if sunlight wanes.
flavor_text_entries.platinum:
If it senses strong sunlight, it
opens its folded petals to absorb
the sun’s rays with its whole body.
flavor_text_entries.heartgold:
During times of strong sunlight,
its bud blooms, its petals open
fully, and it becomes very active.
flavor_text_entries.soulsilver:
During times of strong sunlight,
its bud blooms, its petals open
fully, and it becomes very active.

its petals open fully, and it becomes very active.
flavor_text_entries.alpha-sapphire:
If it senses strong sunlight, it opens its folded
petals to absorb the sun’s rays with its whole body.
flavor_text_entries.sword:
As a bud, it barely moves. It sits still, placidly
waiting for sunlight to appear.
flavor_text_entries.shield:
Its folded petals are pretty tough. Bird Pokémon
can peck at them all they want, and Cherrim
won’t be bothered at all.
flavor_text_entries.legends-arceus:
Motionless, save for the occasional quiver. A rich array of
Pokémon can be found gathered around it, drawn by the
scent exuded from Cherrim's folded petals.

form_descriptions: Sunshine form is active during strong sunlight.  Otherwise, Cherrim defaults to its Overcast form.
